roomTypes.roomTypeName: 1Queen Murphy Bed Fireplace Studio Ste Nosmok
roomTypes.roomTypeDesc: Designed for those who like open floor plans, our Studio Non-Smoking room features an open layout with all the comfortable features of home. The spacious studio includes a murphy queen-sized bed, a television with remote control and a full-sized sofa bed. Our Studio room includes a fully equipped kitchen with a full-sized refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher and domestic stove - plus utensils - to make dining in easy. A living area features a full-sized sofa bed, a comfortable chair and a 37-inch LCD television with remote control. Like all of our suites, our Studio room keeps you connected with complimentary internet access.
roomTypes.name: 1Queen Murphy Bed Fireplace Studio Ste Nosmok

roomTypes.roomTypeName: 1 Queen Bed Fireplace Studio Suite Nonsmoking
roomTypes.roomTypeDesc:
Open plan, fully equipped kitchen, sofa bed, one LCD TVs, internet access

Our studios are designed for those who like an open living space, it features a queen-sized bed and a fully equipped kitchen with a full-sized refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher and domestic stove, plus utensils, to make dining in easy.

Stretch out in the living area which features a full-sized sofa bed and a 37-inch LCD TV, and never miss an email with complimentary internet access.
roomTypes.name: 1 Queen Bed Fireplace Studio Suite Nonsmoking

roomTypes.roomTypeDesc:
Fireplace, living room, sofa bed, fully equipped kitchen, two TVs internet access

Filled with all the comforts of home, our 1 bedroom suite features a bedroom with a queen-sized bed and a separate living area with a full-sized sofa bed.

A fully equipped kitchen with a full-sized refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher, domestic stove, plus utensils will allow you to make your own meals and snacks. A dining area off the kitchen can easily double as work space.

Two 32-inch TVs, and stay connected with complimentary internet access.
roomTypes.name: 1 Queen Bed 1 Bedroom Fireplace Suitenonsmok

roomTypes.roomTypeName: 2 Dbl Beds 1 Bedroom Fireplace Suite Nonsmok
roomTypes.roomTypeDesc:
Fireplace, living room, sofa bed, fully equipped kitchen, two TVs, internet access

Filled with all the comforts of home our 1 bedroom suite features a bedroom with 2 double beds, and a separate living area with a full-sized sofa bed.

A fully equipped kitchen with a full-sized refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher, domestic stove, plus utensils will allow you to make your own meals and snacks. A dining area off the kitchen can easily double as work space.

Two 37-inch TVs, and stay connected with complimentary internet access.
roomTypes.name: 2 Dbl Beds 1 Bedroom Fireplace Suite Nonsmok

roomTypes.roomTypeName: 1Qn 1dbl Bed 1 Bdrm Loft Fireplace Ste Nosmok
roomTypes.roomTypeDesc:
Loft, separate living room, sofa bed, fully equipped kitchen, two TVs, internet access

Stay in this loft suite and enjoy the extra space including a bedroom with a queen-sized bed and a 32-inch LCD TV, and a separate living area with a full-sized sofa bed and another 32-inch LCD TV. This suite also features a double bed up in the loft.

A fully equipped kitchen with a full-sized refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher, domestic stove, plus utensils will allow you to make your own meals and snacks. A dining area off the kitchen can easily double as work space. Stay connected with complimentary internet access.
roomTypes.name: 1Qn 1dbl Bed 1 Bdrm Loft Fireplace Ste Nosmok

roomTypes.roomTypeName: 2Dbls W Qn Murphy Bd 1bdrm Fireplc Ste Nosmok
roomTypes.roomTypeDesc:
1 bedroom, living room, sofa bed, Queen Murphy Bed, fully equipped kitchen, two TVs, internet access

This spacious suite is ideal for those looking for that extra space and can accommodate up to eight guests.

The bedroom features 2 double beds, closet space and a 37-inch LCD TV.

The suite separate living room is spacious and features a full-sized sofa bed, and a Queen Murphy bed located in the additional sleeping area tucked behind a half wall for added privacy. Stay connected with complimentary internet access or watch television by the fireplace.

A fully equipped kitchen with a full-sized refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher, domestic burner stove, plus utensils will allow you to make your own meals and snacks.
roomTypes.name: 2Dbls W Qn Murphy Bd 1bdrm Fireplc Ste Nosmok

roomTypes.roomTypeDesc:
2 bedrooms, living room, sofa bed, fully equipped kitchen, two TVs, internet access

This spacious suite is ideal for those looking for that extra space as it features 2 bedrooms, one with a queen bed the other with 2 double beds, each room has closet space and a 37-inch LCD TV. Most of our two bedrooms have two bathrooms.

Stretch out in the separate living room which has a full-sized sofa bed and stay connected with complimentary internet access.

A fully equipped kitchen with a full-sized refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher, domestic stove, plus utensils will allow you to make your own meals and snacks.
roomTypes.name: 1Queen 2dbl Beds 2bdrm Fireplace Suite Nosmok
